description:
Plan your trip, evlatuate slopes, and ensure good travel habits with this helpful note book. It includes essential snow study information and 50 pages for noting trip plans, field observation, and snow profiles.

  • Includes AIARE communication checklist, decision making framework, and observations reference
  • Waterproof pages won't fall apart on wet days
  • 17.5 x 11.5cm
name: Backcountry Access Backcountry Decision Making Guide
